channel.title: Admin text colour
channel.description:
How can I change the admin and mod text colour from yellow default?
I have seen it on a few servers without clients and was wondering how?

item.title: Admin text colour
item.dc:creator: @masta_XY masta XY
item.description:
@masta_XY wrote:

[quote=“yazoomafroo, post:3, topic:252014”]I said it was on a none client.

Could anyone explain how to do this on a server just a bog standard silabsoft?[/quote]
You cant.

And for all you know they could have been using a client, you would not know unless you were them.

Read full topic

item.title: Admin text colour
item.dc:creator: @masta_XY masta XY
item.description:
@masta_XY wrote:

[quote=“yazoomafroo, post:1, topic:252014”]How can I change the admin and mod text colour from yellow default?

I have seen it on a few servers without clients and was wondering how?[/quote]
They are using a client, or using the color name: Text
That’s normally the way its changed.

Read full topic
